00001 #ifndef _ESM_GLOB_H
00002 #define _ESM_GLOB_H
00003 
00004 #include "esm_reader.hpp"
00005 
00006 namespace ESM {
00007 
00008 /*
00009  * Global script variables
00010  */
00011 
00012 struct Global
00013 {
00014   unsigned value;
00015   VarType type;
00016 
00017   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00018   {
00019     VarType t;
00020     std::string tmp = esm.getHNString("FNAM");
00021     if(tmp == "s") t = VT_Short;
00022     else if(tmp == "l") t = VT_Int;
00023     else if(tmp == "f") t = VT_Float;
00024     else esm.fail("Illegal global variable type " + tmp);
00025     type = t;
00026 
00027     // Note: Both floats and longs are represented as floats.
00028     esm.getHNT(value, "FLTV");
00029   }
00030 };
00031 }
00032 #endif
